word:
There will always be those who are seeking for something new and who stretch and strain the Word of God to make it support their ideas and theories. Let us, brethren, take the things that God has given us, and which His Spirit has taught us is truth, and believe them, leaving alone those theories which His Spirit has not endorsed.--Ms 125, 1907. ("Lessons from the Visions of Ezekiel," July 4, 1907.) 

White Estate Washington, D. C. January 17, 1980
